# `NhostGraphqlClient`

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">params</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> [`NhostGraphqlConstructorParams`](/reference/docgen/javascript/nhost-js/types/nhost-graphql-constructor-params)
